You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by sending 1 Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck to the GY. If Summoned this way, you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Rank 4 Xyz Monsters. You can only Special Summon "Ext Ryzeal" once per turn this way.

effects.effect: You can add 1 FIRE Thunder monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Ext Ryzeal" once per turn.

If you have an Xyz Monster in your field or GY, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If summoned this way, you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Rank 4 Xyz Monsters. You can only Special Summon "Node Ryzeal" once per turn this way.

Cards with that name, and their effects, cannot be used. Cards already on the field are not affected (including face-down cards).
